title: Translate and Learn
subtitle: Type what you want to say, tune the tone, and get a natural Lithuanian translation.
points: Enter any English phrase you want to express.
Choose who you're speaking to (neutral / male / female).
Pick the tone: friendly, neutral, or polite.
Tap Translate to get Lithuanian, meaning, and phonetics.

title: Save and Organise
subtitle: Build your own library of useful phrases.
points: Tap Save to store translations in your library.
Add entries manually from Home or Library.
Edit or delete phrases using the action buttons.
Use tabs to sort by Phrases, Questions, Words, or Numbers.
